page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area with which we were concerned is in a Green Belt Area .The means that any development of housing or industry is closely monitored. This area has no heavy industry or light industrial estates.The main industries are farming and recreation/tourism. Local people tend to work outside the area in Newcastle or in the new towns such as Washington or Killingworth. There are opportunities for employment within the area but these are somewhat limited being restricted to local shops and service industries. The farming community is also rather restrictive in terms of employment and tend to work as family units. The largest single private employer is probably the Pesto supermarket.
